attributes.additional_details:
The website LadsLads.com is currently and has been in the past misusing information by members of the public signed up to the site including doctoring personal profiles to claim illness, improper input of data on unused accounts providing other socially unacceptable information, taking money from customers without the ability to contact the site owners for support and help and no way to remove profile or change some personal details once published on a personal profile.

We the undersigned petition the government to take action and enforce the Information Commissioners Office to swiftly act in investigating the website LadsLads.com. This website should be closed down for ongoing corruption and violations of the data protection act with the actions of company directors making them not fit to be trading in the UK or the US/Canada.
